concept.name: grid-template-columns
concept.explain: Track sizing controls the width of each column. Resize the first column track so the car matches the highlighted bay.

ui.prompt: Keep the car in column 1, row 2 and resize column tracks so it fully fills the highlighted wide bay.
hints: Keep .car placement unchanged and adjust only the track widths.

entities.baseCss: background: rgba(200, 0, 0, 0.22); outline: 2px dashed rgba(200, 0, 0, 0.8); border-radius: 10px; min-width: 180px; justify-self: start;

concept.name: grid-template-rows
concept.explain: Track sizing also controls row height. Resize the second row track so the car matches the tall highlighted bay.

ui.prompt: Keep the car in column 3, row 2 and resize row tracks so it fully fills the highlighted tall bay.
hints: Leave .car grid-column and grid-row as they are.

entities.baseCss: background: rgba(200, 0, 0, 0.22); outline: 2px dashed rgba(200, 0, 0, 0.8); border-radius: 10px; min-height: 170px; align-self: start;

concept.name: combine columns and rows
concept.explain: Use both grid-template-columns and grid-template-rows to size one parking bay in both directions.

ui.prompt: Keep the car in column 2, row 2 and resize both column and row tracks to match the larger highlighted bay.

entities.baseCss: background: rgba(200, 0, 0, 0.22); outline: 2px dashed rgba(200, 0, 0, 0.8); border-radius: 10px; min-width: 150px; min-height: 150px; justify-self: start; align-self: start;
